name: eyespy
0:
”Alexa, open eye spy”
”Alexa, eye spy”
”Alexa, start eye spy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eye spy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
alexa skill eye spy is smart,you can use it to control device.
Please use lancens account to oauth alexa skill!
1.you can say 'Alexa, open eye spy', then say 'Turn on my home recording'.
2.you can say 'Alexa, open eye spy', then say 'Turn off my home recording'.
3.you can say 'Alexa, open eye spy', then say 'Turn on my home detection'.
4.you can say 'Alexa, open eye spy', then say 'Turn off my home detection'.
5.you can say 'Alexa, open eye spy', then say 'bye'.
